LongDescription:
TRACK MAINTENANCE | May 29 - Jun 1, Tue to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Brooklyn Bridge-bound [6] trains run express from Pelham Bay Park to Parkchester in the Bronx


For service to Buhre Av, Middletown Rd, Westchester Sq, Zerega and Castle Hill Avs,
take the [6] to Parkchester and transfer to a Pelham Bay Park-bound [6].

For service from these stations take the [6] to Pelham Bay Park and transfer
to a Brooklyn Bridge-bound [6].
